授業目的:
To continue to develop
the listening and speaking skills learned in the Spring semester to more
effectively participate in interactions relevant to the lives of university
students in Japan. This includes discussing day-to-day activities in English as
well as completing paired or group presentations and small-group discussions.
特記事項: 【合併】英語Iｄ　３（経済学部）/英語IIｂ　３（経済学部）
授業方法:
Classes will be
interactive and group-work based, with some language and skills guidance from
the teacher. Learners are expected to participate actively in all tasks to gain
the maximum benefit to their spoken English skills. There will be a range of
spoken tasks, including group discussions, presentations, supported by reading
& listening tasks. Materials will include a selection from the textbook as
well as additional materials distributed in class and on LUNA.

第1回: Spring semester review & Fall course preview;  Summer vacation discussion; diagnostic vocabulary test
第5回: Unit 7: Story telling; discussion skills review
第8回: Speaking test reflection and session 9 preparation
第9回: Unit 9: Discussing culture; presentation skills review
第10回: Unit 9: Discussing culture; presentation skills 2, group presentations
第11回: Unit 10: Music; presentation skills - presenting in pairs
